title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 29 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 29 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: Moreover Job continued his parable, and said,
lineList.cn: 约伯又接着说，

lineList.en: Oh that I were as in months past, as in the days when God preserved me;
lineList.cn: 惟愿我的景况如从前的月份，如神保守我的日子。

lineList.en: When his candle shined upon my head, and when by his light I walked through darkness;
lineList.cn: 那时他的灯照在我头上。我藉他的光行过黑暗。

lineList.en: As I was in the days of my youth, when the secret of God was upon my tabernacle;
lineList.cn: 我愿如壮年的时候，那时我在帐棚中。神待我有密友之情。

lineList.en: When the Almighty was yet with me, when my children were about me;
lineList.cn: 全能者仍与我同在。我的儿女都环绕我。

lineList.en: When I washed my steps with butter, and the rock poured me out rivers of oil;
lineList.cn: 奶多可洗我的脚。磐石为我出油成河。

lineList.en: When I went out to the gate through the city, when I prepared my seat in the street!
lineList.cn: 我出到城门，在街上设立座位。

lineList.en: The young men saw me, and hid themselves: and the aged arose, and stood up.
lineList.cn: 少年人见我而回避，老年人也起身站立。

lineList.en: The princes refrained talking, and laid their hand on their mouth.
lineList.cn: 王子都停止说话，用手糊口。

lineList.en: The nobles held their peace, and their tongue cleaved to the roof of their mouth.
lineList.cn: 首领静默无声，舌头贴住上膛。

lineList.en: When the ear heard me, then it blessed me; and when the eye saw me, it gave witness to me:
lineList.cn: 耳朵听我的，就称我有福。眼睛看我的，便称赞我。

lineList.en: Because I delivered the poor that cried, and the fatherless, and him that had none to help him.
lineList.cn: 因我拯救哀求的困苦人，和无人帮助的孤儿。

lineList.en: The blessing of him that was ready to perish came upon me: and I caused the widow's heart to sing for joy.
lineList.cn: 将要灭亡的为我祝福。我也使寡妇心中欢乐。

lineList.en: I put on righteousness, and it clothed me: my judgment was as a robe and a diadem.
lineList.cn: 我以公义为衣服，以公平为外袍和冠冕。

lineList.en: I was eyes to the blind, and feet was I to the lame.
lineList.cn: 我为瞎子的眼，瘸子的脚。

lineList.en: I was a father to the poor: and the cause which I knew not I searched out.
lineList.cn: 我为穷乏人的父，素不认识的人，我查明他的案件。

lineList.en: And I brake the jaws of the wicked, and plucked the spoil out of his teeth.
lineList.cn: 我打破不义之人的牙床，从他牙齿中夺了所抢的。

lineList.en: Then I said, I shall die in my nest, and I shall multiply my days as the sand.
lineList.cn: 我便说，我必死在家中（原文作窝中），必增添我的日子，多如尘沙。

lineList.en: My root was spread out by the waters, and the dew lay all night upon my branch.
lineList.cn: 我的根长到水边，露水终夜沾在我的枝上。

lineList.en: My glory was fresh in me, and my bow was renewed in my hand.
lineList.cn: 我的荣耀在身上增新，我的弓在手中日强。

lineList.en: Unto me men gave ear, and waited, and kept silence at my counsel.
lineList.cn: 人听见我而仰望，静默等候我的指教。

lineList.en: After my words they spake not again; and my speech dropped upon them.
lineList.cn: 我说话之后，他们就不再说。我的言语像雨露滴在他们身上。

lineList.en: And they waited for me as for the rain; and they opened their mouth wide as for the latter rain.
lineList.cn: 他们仰望我如仰望雨，又张开口如切慕春雨。

lineList.en: If I laughed on them, they believed it not; and the light of my countenance they cast not down.
lineList.cn: 他们不敢自信，我就向他们含笑。他们不使我脸上的光改变。

lineList.en: I chose out their way, and sat chief, and dwelt as a king in the army, as one that comforteth the mourners.
lineList.cn: 我为他们选择道路，又坐首位。我如君王在军队中居住，又如吊丧的安慰伤心的人。
